properties.name: cellCSSClassName
properties.rawdescription: Additional CSS classes for data cells.

properties.name: cellRendererComponent
properties.description: Custom data cell renderer component. Inject CellRendererContext to get access to data value, item and column object.
properties.rawdescription: Custom data cell renderer component. Inject `CellRendererContext` to get access to data value, item and column object.

properties.name: custom
properties.rawdescription: Marks a user configured custom column

properties.name: dataType
properties.description: Optional type of data in the column (used to set data-type attribute, e.g. for additional styling).
properties.rawdescription: Optional type of data in the column (used to set data-type attribute, e.g. for additional styling).

properties.name: externalFilterQuery
properties.description: Custom filtering form renderer can set any value here and it can be used to build a query to the server.
properties.rawdescription: Custom filtering form renderer can set any value here and it can be used to build a query to the server.

properties.name: filteringFormRendererComponent
properties.description: Custom filtering form renderer component. Inject FilteringFormRendererContext to get access to column object and methods: applyFilter, resetFilter.
properties.rawdescription: Custom filtering form renderer component. Inject `FilteringFormRendererContext` to get access to column object and methods: applyFilter, resetFilter.

properties.name: filterPredicate
properties.description: The string to search for or a function for client-side filtering.
properties.rawdescription: The string to search for or a function for client-side filtering.

properties.name: header
properties.description: The column's header (if not given, name is used by default).
properties.rawdescription: The column's header (if not given, `name` is used by default).

properties.name: headerCellRendererComponent
properties.description: Custom header cell renderer component. Inject CellRendererContext to get access to header value and column object.
properties.rawdescription: Custom header cell renderer component. Inject `CellRendererContext` to get access to header value and column object.

properties.name: headerCSSClassName
properties.description: Additional CSS classes for the header cell.
properties.rawdescription: Additional CSS classes for the header cell.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path in a row item to read the cell value from.
properties.rawdescription: The path in a row item to read the cell value from.

properties.name: positionFixed
properties.description: Whether the column can be moved to another position.
properties.rawdescription: Whether the column can be moved to another position.

properties.name: resizable
properties.rawdescription: Whether the column can be resized.

properties.name: sortOrder
properties.description: Whether the sort order is ascending, descending or not specified.
properties.rawdescription: Whether the sort order is ascending, descending or not specified.
